code:
graph TB
    subgraph "monbus_axil_group"
        subgraph "Monitor Bus Input"
            MON_IN[Logistics_TrackingNumber] --> PARSE[Logistics_Warehouse]
        end

        subgraph "Per-Protocol Filtering"
            PARSE --> FILTER[Logistics_StockLevel]
            AXI_MASK[Logistics_Warehouse] --> FILTER
            AXIS_MASK[Logistics_DeliveryRoute] --> FILTER
            CORE_MASK[Logistics_DeliveryRoute] --> FILTER
        end

        subgraph "Routing Decision"
            FILTER --> DROP{Logistics_TrackingNumber}
            DROP --> |No| ERR_CHK{Logistics_Warehouse}
            DROP --> |Yes| DISCARD[Logistics_TrackingNumber]
            ERR_CHK --> |Yes| ERR_PATH[Logistics_DeliveryRoute]
            ERR_CHK --> |No| WR_PATH[Logistics_Warehouse]
        end

        subgraph "Error/Interrupt Path"
            ERR_PATH --> ERR_FIFO[Logistics_DeliveryRoute]
            ERR_FIFO --> AXIL_S[Logistics_Warehouse]
            ERR_FIFO --> IRQ[Logistics_Warehouse]
        end

        subgraph "Master Write Path"
            WR_PATH --> WR_FIFO[Logistics_FleetManagement]
            WR_FIFO --> ADDR_GEN[Logistics_Warehouse]
            CFG_BASE[Logistics_StockLevel] --> ADDR_GEN
            ADDR_GEN --> AXIL_M[Logistics_TrackingNumber]
        end
    end

    AXIL_S --> S_AR[Logistics_Warehouse]
    AXIL_S --> S_R[Logistics_Warehouse]
    AXIL_M --> M_AW[Logistics_TrackingNumber]
    AXIL_M --> M_W[Logistics_DeliveryRoute]
    AXIL_M --> M_B[Logistics_DeliveryRoute]

    style FILTER fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
    style ERR_FIFO fill:#fbb,stroke:#333,stroke-width:3px
    style WR_FIFO fill:#bfb,stroke:#333,stroke-width:3px
    style ADDR_GEN fill:#ffb,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
    style IRQ fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:3px
repo_description: This site is hopefully a springboard for others to learn about coding in System Verilog and experimenting with FPGAs.
